thePirate:BronzeCannon.NAME: Bronze Cannon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand. NL #yCannon #ygains: NL The next Cannonball you play this turn cost 0.

thePirate:SilverCannon.NAME: Silver Cannon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand. NL #yCannon #ygains: NL The next two Cannonballs you play this turn cost 0. NL Apply Vulnerable to target enemy.

thePirate:GoldCannon.NAME: Gold Cannon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand. NL #yCannon #ygains: NL The next two Cannonballs you play this turn cost 0. NL Apply Vulnerable to target enemy. NL Gain 2 Strength.

thePirate:PlatinumCannon.NAME: Platinum Cannon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand. NL #yCannon #ygains: NL The next two Cannonballs you play this turn cost 0. NL Apply Vulnerable and Weaken to all enemies. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL All enemies lose two Strength.

thePirate:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

thePirate:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
thePirate:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

thePirate:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
